ayah: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ شَٰمِخَٰتٖ وَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُم مَّآءٗ فُرَاتٗا
ayah_translit: waja'alna fiha rawasiya shamikhatin wa-asqaynakum maan furatan
ayah_english: And We made therein firmly set mountains lofty and We gave you to drink water sweet
